poem:
Title: An Echo Across the Sand 

Ceasefire's whisper travels far,
past cries of Gaza and the scar
of Israel's ever-wrenching fear,
caught in the crisis of the year.

Dread's blossom on the vine of peace,
calls for the river's war to cease.
And may the hymn of an olive branch,
numb nations to their own mortal dance.
